body_html:
It is actually really nice to be able to call stuff like this:
network.rnn.h0

So adding some add_parameter / remove_parameter would be good, but maybe letting __attr__ access parameters on top of it would be even better.
body_text:
It is actually really nice to be able to call stuff like this:
network.rnn.h0
So adding some add_parameter / remove_parameter would be good, but maybe letting __attr__ access parameters on top of it would be even better.
body:
It is actually really nice to be able to call stuff like this:
network.rnn.h0

So adding some add_parameter / remove_parameter would be good, but maybe letting `__attr__` access parameters on top of it would be even better.
